summary: A clear tutorial that teaches you how to make parallax maps with total of 18 images.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#efefef][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]
This tutorial teaches you how to make parallax maps with easy steps.

Would you like to see the first image in game? Get it from [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/bbibd5lkok30zuh/4k+Parallax+River+Rock.rar]here[/url]Â (requires enb 266+(terrain parallax)).[/size][/font]
